verbs.description: [ARG0: Former Secretary of State John Kerry] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: brushed] aside [ARG1: President Trump ’s suggestion that his discussions with the Iranian foreign minister about salvaging the Iran deal are “ possibly illegal] . ”

Former Secretary of State John Kerry on Monday brushed aside President Trump ’s suggestion that his discussions with the Iranian foreign minister about [V: salvaging] [ARG1: the Iran deal] are “ possibly illegal . ”

Former Secretary of State John Kerry on Monday brushed aside President Trump ’s suggestion that [ARG1: his discussions with the Iranian foreign minister about salvaging the Iran deal] [V: are] “ [ARGM-ADV: possibly] [ARG2: illegal] . ”
